name: Microwave Cottage Pie Plates with Peas and Warm Rolls
description: Family-friendly cottage pie heated in the microwave, served with quick-steamed peas and warmed rolls. Zero chili heat and ready in minutes.
prep_steps: Set out 1 large microwave-safe dish and 2 microwave-safe bowls.
Open the cottage pie packaging (pierce film if directed).
Measure peas and place into a bowl with a splash of water.
Place rolls on a plate and cover with a paper towel.
cook_steps: Microwave the cottage pie according to package directions until hot in the center (about 6–8 minutes for a family tray), resting as directed.
Microwave the peas until tender (2–3 minutes), then drain any water and season lightly with salt if desired.
Microwave the rolls to warm (30–60 seconds) until soft.
Spoon cottage pie onto plates, add peas on the side, and serve with warm rolls.

ingredients.preparation: rinse; add splash of water for steaming
